Class ToolCardAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.tool_card.actions.ToolCardAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddDieToBoardAction, ChooseDieFromRoundTrackAction, DraftDieAction, FlipDieAction, IncrementDecrementDieAction, MoveSelectedDieAction, ReDrawDieAction, ReRollDraftPoolAction, RollDieAction, SelectDieFromBoardAction, SelectSameColorDieAction, SkipTurnAction, SwapDraftedChosenDieAction

    public abstract class ToolCardAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic action that a tool card can execute
